item.title: Advises that presence & irradiation of explosives in reactor must be evaluated due to potential for damage to reactor. Evaluation requested establishing operating restrictions,max quantity of explosives allowed in facility & form.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: US ATOMIC ENERGY COMMISSION (AEC)

item.title: Further response to FOIA requests for documents re Dow Chemical Co of Midland,MI.Forwards Apps H,I,J & K documents. Documents also available in PDR.Document I-10 partially withheld (ref FOIA Exemption 6).

item.title: Responds to FOIA request for documents re physical security & safeguards insp rept for nonpower reactors in Regions II & V from 1979 to present.Forwards documents listed in app. Portions withheld (ref FOIA Exemption 5).
